channel.title: oneAPI Community Page
channel.description: Recent content on oneAPI Community Page

item.title: Online Speech Therapist
item.description: Welcome to our platform! Here, we integrate cutting-edge machine learning technology from Hugging Face to assist with speech therapy. Our tools are tailored for doctors, parents, and administrators, making speech assessment and treatment more accessible and efficient. With intuitive features, we simplify addressing speech challenges, ultimately enhancing communication skills. advanced technology to revolutionize speech therapy and improve outcomes for all involved. Innovating Speech Therapy: Introducing Groundbreaking Tools for Assessment and Treatment, Intel¬Æ oneAPI is used to optimize the models to provide accurate and efficient prediction

item.title: Imagine Childworks
item.description: SmartTravel Assistantüåç‚úàÔ∏èis your ultimate travel companion, utilizing AI and ML ü§ñ to offer personalized itineraries, route optimization, accommodation suggestions, and real-time updates. hello to seamless adventures with SmartTravel Assistant. ‚ú®

item.title: Sign Langauge Translator oneAPI
item.description: We will develop a Sign Gesture Language Translator using MediaPipe and the Intel OneAPI Platform. The translator will be able to recognize sign gestures captured from a video stream and convert them into corresponding text or spoken language.

item.title: Deepfake Detection
item.description: We’ve created a DeepFake Detection system which intends to detect DeepFake videos using Deep Learning techniques like ResNext and LSTM.In this code, we’ve integrated Intel OneAPI ONEDAL for PCA preprocessing by using its PCA implementation. Additionally, we’ve imported tbb for potential parallel processing tasks.

item.title: PC Part Bot
item.description: This is a project on Generative AI PC Part Recommender Bot developed using Intel oneAPI tools and created with Streamlit.

item.title: Levelzero Jni
item.description: Intel LevelZero JNI library for TornadoVM

item.title: oneAPI Hackathon Qa Chatbot
item.description: A python application which contains various python libraries which will generate answers based on the question.

item.title: SYCL FNIRS Motion Detectio
item.description: SYCL machine learning libraries to detect motion detection in fNIRS.

item.title: MuSYCL
item.description: This is a small music synthesizer to experiment with C++23 programming, design patterns and acceleration on hardware accelerators like GPU, FPGA or CGRA with the SYCL 2020 standard.

item.title: Sycl Collision Sim
item.description: Example SYCL implementation of collision detection

item.title: SYCL Ray Tracing
item.description: Ray tracing using SYCL.

item.title: Parallel Spmv Sycl Multi Queue
item.description: Sylc version of parallelSpnv using multiple queues for the solution

item.title: Dwarf Bench
item.description: ‚ÄúDwarf bench‚Äù is a collection of patterns that attempt to capture performance characteristics of analytical queries. The idea is to extend the taxonomy of computational patterns defined in the article ‚ÄúThe Landscape of Parallel Computing Research‚Äù published in 2006 to data analytics in heterogeneous environments. Implementing basic structures and algorithms once for multiple devices strives to find a balance between performance and specific capabilities usage, and implementation effort. We chose platform-agnostic tools to express our language of patterns (OpenCL, SYCL).

item.title: VapourSynth BilateralGPU
item.description: Bilateral filter is a non-linear, edge-preserving and noise-reducing smoothing filter for images. The intensity value at each pixel in an image is replaced by a weighted average of intensity values from nearby pixels. This weight can be based on a Gaussian distribution.

item.title: Altis Sycl
item.description: Altis-SYCL is a SYCL-based implementation of the Altis GPGPU benchmark suite (originally written in CUDA) for CPUs, GPUs, and FPGAs. Altis-SYCL has been migrated from CUDA using the DPC++ Compatibility Tool (DPCT) of oneAPI v2022.1. Our main focus is to evaluate the performance of these GPU-tailored SYCL kernels and to investigate their optimization potential for FPGAs. For some cases, minor code changes were made to speedup the FPGA port as our interest lies in the achievable performance without major rework of the kernels.

item.title: Neural Network Sim
item.description: Neural Network Simulation Written in C++ using Intel OneAPI and ImGUI Libraries.

item.title: RayBNN_Sparse
item.description: Sparse Matrix Library for GPUs, CPUs, and FPGAs via CUDA, OpenCL, and oneAPI.

item.title: Sycl Test Offload
item.description: A sandbox for testing a SYCL-enabled DLL + a non-SYCL test program.

item.title: Xpu
item.description: Compile and run C++ code with CUDA, HIP, SYCL or OpenMP.

item.title: DPCPP Svm
item.description: The mission of ThunderSVM is to help users easily and efficiently apply SVMs to solve problems. ThunderSVM exploits GPUs and multi-core CPUs to achieve high efficiency. Key features of ThunderSVM are as follows.

item.title: OneAPI FPGA
item.description: Developing Applications using Intel¬Æ oneAPI for FPGAs

item.title: OneAPI Crystal
item.description: SYCL implementation of the Crystal library for SQL queries on GPU and CPU, based on http://anilshanbhag.in/static/papers/crystal_sigmod20.pdf

item.title: Oneapi Dct
item.description: Use OneAPI to implement the DCT algorithm. Reference from Intel OneAPI Github.

item.title: Onevpl Rs
item.description: A rust wrapper around the Intel OneAPI Video Processing Library

item.title: Accelerating Deep Learning Classification Wiwth Intel OneAPI
item.description: Image classification is a significant task in the field of deep learning. However, deep learning models usually require substantial computational resources. To address this, this article introduces how to use Intel oneAPI tools, especially Intel¬Æ AI Analytics Toolkit, to accelerate deep learning image classification tasks. We will build a simple Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) and train it to classify images.

item.title: OneMD
item.description: oneMD is a molecular dynamics simulator designed to take advantage of SIMD and GPU and FPGA hardware data parallelism and acceleration.

item.title: oneAPI Samples Feb2022
item.description: The oneAPI samples repository provides code samples for Intel oneAPI toolkits.

item.title: TMIP 2019 NCoV Recognition
item.description: We propose the use of Deep Neural Networks, as an initial experiment we used ChexNeXt Pneumonia Detection Model as the baseline architecture where we use transfer learning to detect pneumonia. Secondly we use three different convolutional neural network architectures (ResNet50, InceptionV3 and Inception-ResNetV2) for the detection of coronavirus pneumonia infected patients using chest X-ray radiographs.

item.title: Numpy Mkl Wheels
item.description: This repository provides unofficial binary wheels for open-source extension packages for Python on Windows, linked to the Intel(r) oneAPI Math Kernel Library (oneAPI MKL).

item.title: Mkl Verbose Toolkit
item.description: We propose script to facilitate the generation and the parsing of Math Verbose log file: To parse the log file and generate summary tables, use mkl_parse.py or cublas_parse.py To restrict the verbosity for one MPI_RANK, use mkl_hook wrapper.

item.title: Bangalore House Price Prediction with oneAPI
item.description: To develop a machine learning-based model to predict home prices accurately for potential homebuyers in Bangalore.

item.title: Crop prediction oneAPI
item.description: The crop recommendation application is a cutting-edge tool that helps farmers make informed decisions about what crops to grow. The application leverages machine learning algorithms to provide customized crop recommendations based on the soil data provided by the user.

item.title: oneAPI Antispoofing
item.description: Certiface AntiSpoofing use oneAPI for fast decode video for perform liveness detection with inference.

item.title: Hias All oneAPI Classifier
item.description: A HIAS compatible Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia classifier trained using Intel Distribution for Python and Intel Optimized Tensorflow. Uses OpenVINO to deploy the model to a Raspberry Pi and Neural Compute Stick 2 for inference on the edge.

item.title: Open Gesture for African Sign Language
item.description: This project provides Python code to recognize African Sign Language gestures for numbers using OpenCV AI Kit: OAK‚ÄîD depth cameras. Additionally, this project showcases the utility of convolutional neural networks as a key component of real-time gesture classification pipelines using Intel OpenVINO.

item.title: Cleansweep
item.description: CleanSweep.AI uses the OpenVINO toolkit to optimize the processing of the object detection model to detect the scattared garbage from the input video.

item.title: Lunar Model oneAPI
item.description: Our project lunar api as established in the documentation uses Segmentation model that is developed using CNN in a U-net Architecture.

item.title: Breast Cancer With oneAPI
item.description: Logistic regression can identify important predictors of breast cancer using odds ratios and generate confidence intervals that provide additional information for decision-making. Model

item.title: Smart Garbage Segregation
item.description: Image classification for recycling refers to the use of machine learning algorithms to automatically classify images of waste materials, such as plastic, paper, and metal, into their respective categories.
